description:
About the game;
Being a worm is not easy in this side-scrolling adventure. After having escaped from the fisherman’s bait can, you plummet down into the reef. There you must make your way out while traveling in a breathable air bubble. Avoid obstacles and explore each level with care since there are hidden items that are essential to get to freedom.

Features:
•	Old-school difficulty elements.
•	Precision in-game movement to avoid hazards.
•	Race against time.
•	Follow hints to uncover secrets.
•	Stunning 2D original illustrations.
•	Classical animation.
•	Fun for all ages!

Help our hero escape his "Fishy Fate!
name: Reef Escape
publisher: Rochester Institute of Technology MAGIC Spell Studios
intro: Travel the underwater dangers of the reef in an air bubble. Test your reflexes as you avoid obstacles and carefully explore each stage, to grab items essential for clearing each level.
